name: Vortex Vanquisher
effect: Increases Shield Strength by {0}%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {1}% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.
description: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.
